body_html:
@byronyi really appreciate you came to our roadshow event!

For now, if there is not a simple workaround, you can try MirroredStrategy as well. But we still recommend CollectiveAllReducStrategy for multi-node training and we will fix it as soon as possible. Thanks!

body:
@byronyi really appreciate you came to our roadshow event!

For now, if there is not a simple workaround, you can try MirroredStrategy as well. But we still recommend CollectiveAllReducStrategy for multi-node training and we will fix it as soon as possible. Thanks!
